parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place upon, lay on; I add, give in addition. From epi and tithemi; to impose.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The shoulder. Perhaps from the alternate of phero; the shoulder.
